mapper.select: select * from org_user WHERE delflag='0' and id = #{id}
select * from org_user WHERE delflag='0' and username = #{username}
select * from org_user where delflag='0' limit #{begin}, #{rows}
select count(1) from org_user where delflag='0'

SELECT count(1) FROM org_user u LEFT JOIN org_employee e ON e.id=u.employeeid and e.delflag='0' WHERE departmentid IN ( select #{depid} union SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id, parentid, IF(FIND_IN_SET(parentid, @pids) > 0, @pids := CONCAT(@pids, ',', id), 0) pids FROM org_department, (SELECT @pids := #{depid}) var WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parentid, @pids) > 0 ) tmp ) and u.delflag='0'
mapper.insert: insert into org_user (employeeid, username, passwd, email, telephone, esignflag, esignature, epasswd, imsicheckflag, imsi, desktopstyle, enableflag, passwdduedate, errornum, logintime, createtime, modifytime, creator, modifier, delflag) values (#{employeeid}, #{username}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{telephone}, #{esignflag}, #{esignature}, #{epasswd}, #{imsicheckflag}, #{imsi}, #{desktopstyle}, #{enableflag}, #{passwdduedate}, #{errornum}, #{logintime}, #{createtime}, #{modifytime}, #{creator}, #{modifier}, #{delflag})
